| 1 |  | clscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 | 1 | #P_iscld3 | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( S e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) = S ) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_sscls | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> S C_ ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_biantrud | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) C_ S <-> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) C_ S /\ S C_ ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqss | |- ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) = S <-> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) C_ S /\ S C_ ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) ) ) |
